channel.title: Zarketh - Innovation at its finest
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://i.imgur.com/WtjFhXn.png[/img] [URL=http://zarketh.com/play.html][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tSKWtK6.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://www.zarketh.com/][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/woRck82.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://zarketh.com/forum][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PFPEJ8Y.png[/img][/URL] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2n00opx.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FeGTXeQ.gif[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/sKxEY81.gif[/img] [COLOR="#FF0000"]I will add more media very soon[/COLOR]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nFL7Z2VOC0I[/youtube] Please note this video was recorded in one of the past versions of Zarketh. However, we believe it still gives a just view of what to expect from this project. However, we will be updating the video to include newer content! [/CENTER]

item.title: Zarketh - Innovation at its finest
item.dc:creator: @paymon paymon
item.description:
@paymon wrote:

Updates 28th June 2014:

  • Moved to a new dedicated hosting company, the new Dedi is bigger in size and faster. Server will be online 24/7 from now on.
  • Purchased better DDOS protection, expect to see less downtime.
  • Quest tab reorganised and made to look better, will allow for easier use.

Read full topic

item.title: Zarketh - Innovation at its finest
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Interesting little advertisement I suppose, generic for the most part but it’ll do haha. Good luck on the server but it’s not something I’d move to.

Read full topic

item.title: Zarketh - Innovation at its finest
item.dc:creator: @TheAye TheAye
item.description:
@TheAye wrote:

This server is definitely one to try out. The first few moments hook you and it’s such a great group of players and moderators. You will NOT be be disappointed in Zarketh! The content is rich and has yet to cease to quench my thirst for fun. I’ve been playing for the last 4 hours and it’s needless to say, a great private server. I donated $10 within the first 20 minutes I joined.

Read full topic

item.title: Zarketh - Innovation at its finest
item.dc:creator: @Orez Orez
item.description:
@Orez wrote:

I’ve been playing this server for about three days, and I really like it, there are some things that need to be fixed, but all in all, it’s a fantastic server just starting out.

Read full topic
